name: Bio-Active® Grease Trap Treatment Super Concentrate
description: Bio-Active® Grease Trap Treatment Super Concentrate is based on a select combination of natural soil bacteria in spore form or in stabilized vegetative states. Aerobic as well as anaerobic bacterial species included in the formula. Bacteria usually require a few days to activate and adjust to the new environment. Once established the bacterial will carry out the work effectively to completion. The Bio-Active product is formulated with a light fragrance.
